Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I have spent weeks trying to design a rocket and rover that is able to get to Mun, and I finally perfected my design enough to the stage of it working like a treat.

I got the design idea from the Mars rover Curiosity that is planned to land in August this year. Here are my screenshots:

This is the rocket that carry\'s the rover to Mun, it is light and stable with 4 boosters for launch

Cool image from space

4h - Almost at Mun

5h - starting brake burn

Shell bursting open

This is about the time I had a heart attack

Slowing pod about to drop rover

Destiny has landed and the reverse thrust landing pod flies away

Then smashed into Mun

Thanks for viewing

(If you want the craft just PM me)

You should have posted it in The Spacecraft Exchange: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=15.0

It looks great though, whats mod or mods are you using?

You should have posted it in The Spacecraft Exchange: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=15.0

It looks great though, whats mod or mods are you using?

Its the C7 pack and the cart mod, I think that\'s it
Those parts are in the C7 pack? Are you sure? o.O
No. It\'s not C7. C7 is spaceplanes.
Where\'d you get those rover wheels? That doesn\'t look like the cart.

That looks a lot like NovaSilisko\'s parts and maybe the Payload Fairings pack. Though that knowledge is from about 0.12, they might have been included in some other pack in the meantime. There\'s the NovaPunch parts pack for example which I believe includes all parts that used to be in Sunday Punch and NovaSilisko\'s packs.

Where\'d you get those rover wheels? That doesn\'t look like the cart.

Oh hey, look! It\'s Eugene Kranz. Just bought your book, Failure is Not an Option. haha

Where\'d you get those rover wheels? That doesn\'t look like the cart.

It is the cart - Tosh put out a new version (1.3) that included that cart, which has a different form of suspension and wheels that can be retracted.

Does anybody know what pack this is from or if it\'s from a separate download? I\'ve downloaded a few different packs over the past couple of days and haven\'t found it yet. Maybe I\'ve just missed it.

Does anybody know what pack this is from or if it\'s from a separate download? I\'ve downloaded a few different packs over the past couple of days and haven\'t found it yet. Maybe I\'ve just missed it.

Yeah I\'d like to know too. It\'s definately the Cart pack or something based on the wheels and the fact that it can move around. They named above that it might be the NovaSlisko pack, but I can\'t find it and I know for a fact it\'s not in the NovaPunch pack since I\'ve already got that and the Slisko pack.
